author: kevaundray
content:
Was checking out https://hackmd.io/@uncle-bill/H1fDS3cIWl by <@358120958726373381> ; very easy to read

I noticed the corresponding PR will be merged into unstable vs into the conga line, is that correct?

author: kevaundray
content: I was initially under the impression that the DA checker would just be extended with the current architecture -- pulling payload validity out of the DA checker will simplify things for us I think though

author: 0xunclebill
content: hey! yes this will get merged to unstable as opposed to the conga line. I didn't think about the implications re: execution proofs, but thats even more of of a reason to separate payload validity out of the da checker
